notes: This is a template configuration file for creating new agents
Replace placeholder values with your agent-specific content
Template variables are substituted at runtime using {variableName} syntax
Environment-specific behavior is handled by the LLM helper automatically
Use 'blank' prompts to disable specific prompt components
The behavior section controls how prompts are selected and processed
All template variables support default values and validation
examples: See AgentZero configuration for a complete implementation example
Error handling: Use errorMessages section for consistent error responses
